targets.expr:
(
  sum(rate(outbox_process_latency_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$box_name", le="10"}[$__rate_interval])) by (name)
+
  sum(rate(outbox_process_latency_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$box_name", le="45"}[$__rate_interval])) by (name)
) / 2 / sum(rate(outbox_process_latency_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$box_name"}[$__rate_interval])) by (name) * 100

panels.description: The difference in the time of creating an outbox item and processing

targets.expr:
(
  sum(rate(outbox_process_latency_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$box_name", le="10"}[$__rate_interval])) by (name)
+
  sum(rate(outbox_process_latency_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$box_name", le="45"}[$__rate_interval])) by (name)
) / 2 / sum(rate(outbox_process_latency_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$box_name"}[$__rate_interval])) by (name) * 100

panels.title: Queue latency apdex

panels.description: The difference in the time of creating an outbox item and processing
panels.title: Queue latency

targets.expr: sum(increase(outbox_created_counter{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$box_name"}[$__rate_interval])) by (name, partition) - sum(increase(outbox_sent_counter{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$box_name"}[$__rate_interval])) by (name, partition) >= 0
